Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Peninsular Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Girona, steps from Museum of Cinema and minutes from Eiffel Bridge. This hotel is within close proximity of Rafael Maso Foundation and Jewish History Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Peninsular Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Girona, steps from Museum of Cinema and minutes from Eiffel Bridge. This hotel is within close proximity of Rafael Maso Foundation and Jewish History Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of Cinema - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Eiffel Bridge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Rafael Maso Foundation - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Jewish History Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
City History Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Walls of Girona - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Girona's Museum of Art - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Girona Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Church of Sant Feliu - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Arab Baths - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Monestir de Sant Pere de Galligants - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Archaeology Museum of Catalonia - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fira de Girona Convention Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Castle of Montjuic - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Espai Girona Shopping Center - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi

The preferred airport for Peninsular Hotel is Gerona (GRO-Costa Brava) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
